channel.title: Dependency on Burgers & Bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Dependency on Burgers & Bytes

item.title: Import solution missing dependencies error
item.description: Issue Encountering errors while deploying solutions can be a frustrating experience. The errors I received during my first attempt to export and import the solution were difficult to understand. Despite having all the necessary dependent objects included in the solution, the import still failed. The error message: “The solution.xml for the solution xxx contains an unmanaged dependency on the Active solution with type 1, schemaName her_camp, displayName Camp. A solution will fail to import in a target environment when missing dependencies on unmanaged components are present.
